title: Figure, "Red Army Border Guard", 1937
markings: underside: Lomonosov mark for 1937 stamped in orange
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Red Army soldier stands with legs apart, leaning on post with hammer and sickle ornament, his left hand raised over his eyes, in his right hand a standing rifle, he wears long coat and hat; square base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Red Army Border Guard", 1937.
1937. Porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-167.
